name: Internet Explorer for Mac Web Archive
summary: Learn about .WAFF files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Internet Explorer for Mac can open WAFF files but it is not supported by OS X. However, there are several programs available that will assist you in opening your WAFF files. The WebArchivConverter utility (available for OS X 7.5 - 9.2.2) enables you to convert WAFF files into iCab web archives and the WAFInspec program (available for OS X 10.2.5 and later) can be used to browse, preview, and extract WAFF files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
